00022 void eol_particle_close()
00023 {
00024   int i;
00025   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_particle:closing\n");
00026   eol_particle_clear();
00027   for (i = 0;i < _eol_particle_max; i++)
00028   {
00029     eol_particle_delete(&_eol_particle_list[i]);
00030   }
00031   free(_eol_particle_list);
00032   _eol_particle_list = NULL;
00033   _eol_particle_max = 0;
00034   _eol_particle_trail_len = 0;
00035   _eol_particle_initialized = eolFalse;
00036   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_particle:closed\n");
00037 }
00038 
00039 void eol_particle_init()
00040 {
00041   int i;
00042   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_particle:initializing\n");
00043   _eol_particle_list = (eolParticle *)malloc(sizeof(eolParticle)*_eol_particle_max);
00044   if (_eol_particle_list == NULL)
00045   {
00046     eol_logger_message(
00047       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00048       "eol_particle: unable to allocate particle list!\n");
00049     return;
00050   }
00051   memset(_eol_particle_list,0,sizeof(eolParticle)*_eol_particle_max);
00052   for (i = 0;i < _eol_particle_max; i++)
00053   {
00054     eol_particle_create(&_eol_particle_list[i]);
00055   }
00056   atexit(eol_particle_close);
00057   _eol_particle_initialized = eolTrue;
00058   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_particle:initialized\n");
00059 }
00060 
00061 eolBool eol_particle_initialized()
00062 {
00063   return _eol_particle_initialized;
00064 }

00073 void eol_particle_clear()
00074 {
00075   int i;
00076   if (!eol_particle_initialized())return;
00077   for (i = 0; i < _eol_particle_max;i++)
00078   {
00079     eol_particle_kill(&_eol_particle_list[i]);
00080   }
00081 }
00082 
00083 void eol_particle_kill(eolParticle *part)
00084 {
00085   if (!eol_particle_initialized())return;
00086   if (!part)return;
00087   if (part->actor != NULL)
00088   {
00089     eol_actor_free(&part->actor);
00090   }
00091   memset(part,0,sizeof(eolParticle));
00092 }
00093 
00094 void eol_particle_draw_all()
00095 {
00096   int i;
00097   if (!eol_particle_initialized())return;
00098   for (i = 0; i < _eol_particle_max;i++)
00099   {
00100     if (_eol_particle_list[i].lifetime > 0)
00101     {
00102       eol_particle_draw(&_eol_particle_list[i]);
00103     }
00104   }
00105 }

00107 void eol_particle_update_all()
00108 {
00109   int i;
00110   if (!eol_particle_initialized())return;
00111   for (i = 0; i < _eol_particle_max;i++)
00112   {
00113     if (_eol_particle_list[i].lifetime > 0)
00114     {
00115       eol_particle_update(&_eol_particle_list[i]);
00116     }
00117   }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void eol_particle_update(eolParticle *part)
00121 {
00122   if (!part)return;
00123   /*this is really all there should be to particles:
00124    1) tick down the life
00125    2) update orientation and trail
00126    */
00127   part->lifetime--;
00128   if (part->lifetime == 0)
00129   {
00130     eol_particle_kill(part);
00131     return;
00132   }
00133   eol_orientation_add(&part->vector,
00134                       part->vector,
00135                       part->accel);
00136   eol_orientation_add(&part->ori,
00137                       part->ori,
00138                       part->vector);
00139   if ((part->type == eolParticleTrail) ||
00140       (part->drawTrail == eolTrue))
00141   {
00142     eol_trail_append(&part->trail,part->ori);
00143   }
00144   eol_actor_next_frame(part->actor);
00145 }
00146 
00147 void eol_particle_draw(eolParticle *part)
00148 {
00149   if (!part)return;
00150   switch(part->type)
00151   {
00152     case eolParticlePoint:
00153       eol_draw_dot_3D(part->ori.position,
00154                       part->radius,
00155                       part->ori.color,
00156                       part->ori.alpha);
00157       break;
00158     case eolParticleTrail:
00159       eol_draw_trail(&part->trail,
00160                      part->radius,
00161                      part->fade,
00162                      part->taper);
00163       break;
00164     case eolParticleSprite:
00165     case eolParticleModel:
00166     case eolParticleActor:
00167       eol_actor_draw(part->actor,
00168                      part->ori.position,
00169                      part->ori.rotation,
00170                      part->ori.scale,
00171                      part->ori.color,
00172                      part->ori.alpha);
00173       break;
00174   }
00175 }
00176 
00177 void eol_particle_delete(eolParticle *part)
00178 {
00179   if (!part)return;
00180   eol_trail_free(&part->trail);
00181 }
00182 
00183 void eol_particle_create(eolParticle *part)
00184 {
00185   if (!part)return;
00186   eol_trail_new(&part->trail,_eol_particle_trail_len);
00187 }
00188 
00189 eolParticle * eol_particle_new()
00190 {
00191   int i;
00192   if (!eol_particle_initialized())return NULL;
00193   for (i = 0; i < _eol_particle_max;i++)
00194   {
00195     if (_eol_particle_list[i].lifetime == 0)
00196     {
00197       eol_vec3d_set(_eol_particle_list[i].ori.scale,1,1,1);
00198       return &_eol_particle_list[i];
00199     }
00200   }
00201   return NULL;
00202 }

00204 void eol_particle_make_point(eolVec3D position,
00205                              eolVec3D velocity,
00206                              eolVec3D accel,
00207                              eolFloat radius,
00208                              eolVec3D color,
00209                              eolFloat alpha,
00210                              eolUint  lifetime)
00211 {
00212   eolParticle *part;
00213   part = eol_particle_new();
00214   if (part == NULL)return;
00215   eol_vec3d_copy(part->ori.position,position);
00216   eol_vec3d_copy(part->vector.position,velocity);
00217   eol_vec3d_copy(part->accel.position,accel);
00218   eol_vec3d_copy(part->ori.color,color);
00219   part->radius = radius;
00220   part->ori.alpha = alpha;
00221   part->lifetime = lifetime;
00222   part->type = eolParticlePoint;
00223 }
